text:
Additional AI Paragraph
As language models grow in size, the cost of processing every token becomes significantly higher. 
By prioritizing key words and trimming redundant context, adaptive attention mechanisms strive to provide a smarter balance between speed and accuracy. 
This is especially important in real-time applications such as mobile assistants, automated summarization tools, and large-scale document classification. 
The goal is to build models that perform more like the human brain: fast, selective, and efficient without sacrificing comprehension.

text:
Additional Movie Review Paragraph
The cinematography stood out with its thoughtful use of lighting and color to emphasize mood shifts in the plot. 
The soundtrack, while understated, complemented the narrative without overpowering key scenes. 
In comparison to other films in the genre, this one feels more character-driven, prioritizing internal conflict over external action. 
While not perfect, it is a film that rewards patient viewers and offers plenty to reflect on afterward.

text:
Movie Review Sample Text
The movie was surprisingly engaging, with strong character development and a compelling storyline that kept me invested throughout the entire runtime. 
The performances were emotionally grounded, especially from the lead actors, who brought depth and nuance to their roles. 
Although the pacing was slow in the beginning, the emotional payoff in the final act made the overall experience worthwhile. 
Some scenes felt slightly predictable, but the filmâ€™s strong dialogue and visual direction compensated for those moments. 
Fans of drama and mystery will likely enjoy the film, as it blends both genres with a subtle touch of psychological tension.

Additional News Paragraph
